title: Mobile Microlearning for Water Demand Management (WDM) and Integrated Water Resources Management (IWRM)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematics and Environmental Science Concepts, Fundamental Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Education on WDM and IWRM strategies to address "water poverty" in South African urban areas. Contributes to poverty alleviation and MDGs achievement through efficient water service management

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of Water Demand Management (WDM) and their application within Integrated Water Resources Management (IWRM) systems.
Learners can design water use efficiency improvement plans using mathematical modeling.
Learners can execute community-based water management problem-solving projects via mobile platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
